Frequently Asked Questions

How can I submit a news tip?

You can submit news tips through our contact form by selecting "News Tip", or email tips@oyonews.com.ng.

How do I advertise on OyoNews?

Select "Advertising" in the form or contact our team directly at ads@oyonews.com.ng.

What are your response times?

We usually reply within 24–48 business hours. Urgent tips are prioritized immediately.
